name: WiFiDog
author: Brendan Coles <bcoles@gmail.com>
description: The Wifidog project is an open source captive portal solution. Requires: PHP and postgresql

matches.text: I am unable to retrieve the schema version. Either the wifidog database hasn't been created yet, the postgresql server is down, or pg_hba.conf does not allow your web server to connect to the wifidog database.
